summary: Add RpcRetryOption DTO for PHP SDK client calls with support for RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED error handling and congestion-aware retry intervals, following the Java SDK pattern. RpcRetryOption should inherit from RetryOptions for backward compatibility.
userImpact: Users can configure separate RPC-level retry policies with better handling of RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED errors, improving reliability under congestion.
proposedFix: Create RpcRetryOption DTO with CongestionInitialInterval setting and optional Jitter support, inheriting from RetryOptions initially for backward compatibility
resolutionDetails: RpcRetryOption DTO was implemented with congestion-aware retry handling for RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED errors
keyQuote: add an RpcRetryOption DTO, which will include a new option CongestionInitialInterval, affecting how RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED errors are handled
